div.p: SELECT SNOMED CT and Intermountain Healthcare HDD code system values.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-allergyintolerancestatus defines the following codes:

tr.td: Indication that a symptom or condition is subsided or healed.
The state of not likely being true.
